text: The Renault Laguna is a car produced by Renault in three generations from 1994 to 2015. == First generation (1994–2001) == The first Laguna arrived in early 1994 to replace the 21, it came as a hatchback at first and then it was joined by an estate/wagon version in late 1995. It got a facelift in 1998. === Engines === ==== Petrol engines ==== * 1.6 16V 79 kW (107 hp) * 1.8 69 kW (94 hp) * 1.8 16V 88 kW (120 hp) * 2.0 84 kW (114 hp) * 2.0 16V 102 kW (139 hp) * 2.0 S 103 kW (140 hp) * 3.0 V6 123 kW (167 hp) and 140 kW (190 hp) ==== Diesel engines ==== * 1.9 dTi 72 kW (98 hp) * 1.9 dCi 79 kW (107 hp) * 2.2 D 63 kW (86 hp) * 2.2 dT 83 kW (113 hp) == Second generation (2000–2007) == The second Laguna arrived at the end of 2000 and again, hatchback and estate/wagon bodystyles were offered. In 2001, it became the first car to receive 5 stars in the Euro NCAP crash testing, making it one the safest models at the time. It received a facelift in March 2005. === Engines === ==== Petrol engines ==== * 1.6 16V 79 kW (107 hp) and 82 kW (112 hp) * 1.8 16V 88 kW (120 hp) * 2.0 16V 99 kW (135 hp) * 2.0 IDE 103 kW (140 hp) * 2.0 16V Turbo 120 kW (163 hp), 125 kW (170 hp) and 151 kW (205 hp) * 3.0 V6 152 kW (207 hp) ==== Diesel engines ==== * 1.9 dCi 68 kW (92 hp), 77 kW (105 hp), 79 kW (107 hp), 81 kW (110 hp), 88 kW (120 hp) and 96 kW (130 hp) * 2.0 dCi 110 kW (150 hp) and 127 kW (173 hp) * 2.2 dCi 102 kW (139 hp) and 110 kW (150 hp) == Third generation (2007–2015) == The third Laguna went on sale in October 2007 and became available in hatchback, estate/wagon and coupe bodystyles. It received a mild facelift in late 2010. Then in 2015 it was replaced by a new model called the Talisman. === Engines === ==== Petrol engines ==== * 1.6 16V 81 kW (110 hp) * 2.0 16V 103 kW (140 hp) * 2.0 16V Turbo 125 kW (170 hp) and 150 kW (204 hp) * 3.5 V6 175 kW (238 hp) ==== Diesel engines ==== * 1.5 dCi 81 kW (110 hp) * 2.0 dCi 96 kW (130 hp), 110 kW (150 hp), 127 kW (173 hp) and 131 kW (178 hp) * 3.0 V6 dCi 173 kW (235 hp) == Talisman (2015-2022) == The Talisman was revealed in late 2015 as a successor to the Laguna. It switched from a liftback bodystyle to a conventional sedan. It was facelifted in 2020 and discontinued in 2022. thumb|Laguna Category:1990s automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Renault Laguna
